Name: Moon Landing VR
About the game: Ever want to casually explore our solar system from the comfort of your own home? Now you can in Moon Landing VR. * Explore the planets and their moons from orbit while learning facts about them * Inspect scientific hardware above Earth like the Hubble space telescope * Walk on the moon * Stare at the sun without eye damage
